history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the BLUE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Hi bus.
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER This is Edward.
TTS Okay, going to edward p. kanai funeral home. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER Bill call back.
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where do you wanna leave from?
USER Going to the airport.
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where would you like to leave from?
USER the waterfront
TTS Okay, going to the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where do you want to leave from?
USER I want to go to the airport.
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where do you want to leave from?
USER fifth
TTS Okay, leaving from fifth avenue. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER Fifth and Highland
TTS Okay, going to highland avenue at fifth avenue. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 01:39 pm.
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 9 minutes, and you will take 1 bus..
Take the 71B to Highland avenue at Fifth avenue FS. It will depart at 1:44pm..
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
